TopicTitle: [11/26/15 Update] Say Hello to the Light-Green Group!

Articles.Content:
This is possibly the most confusing post I've ever seen on the forum.

Indeed. I have no idea what it was supposed to mean.

And how have I never seen that user, when he has 668 posts?

I now have 3 light green bars!

Congrats!

Quick correction: Frozen_Heart is incorrectly listed in the White Bar Group because the name in the descriptions file was "FrozenHeart" without an underscore. Just correct that in the descriptions file and it'll be correct for future updates

Quick correction: Frozen_Heart is incorrectly listed in the White Bar Group because the name in the descriptions file was "FrozenHeart" without an underscore. Just correct that in the descriptions file and it'll be correct for future updates

Fixed it on the list, will fix the program tonight.
Wow, I'm seventh? I should get back on here more often...

Want an odd little threat... I like soup.

Misdirecting treatise, miniscule or no... Vanilla? No, roast beef.

There are three people with over 9000 posts. Sal_vager, NathanKell, and Red Iron Crown.

I'm getting there. Slowly.
...pation.

Endersmens, you should really consider adding blurbs to replace all those "No Description Yet!" entries. One of the best things about the LGG has been some info about why the posters seem to attract rep.

Endersmens, you should really consider adding blurbs to replace all those "No Description Yet!" entries. One of the best things about the LGG has been some info about why the posters seem to attract rep.

Concur. I know it's a chore, but really we can get everyone's rank order for nothing by sorting the Member List

A possibility to reduce the workload on Endersmens and also get the community to know each other a little better: what if each of us had to research the work of and compose the description for the person immediately above us on the list? (Enders would have to actually update the OP, of course, unless the writer happens to wear a fez and speak French) Just a thought.

Concur. I know it's a chore, but really we can get everyone's rank order for nothing by sorting the Member List

(Enders would have to actually update the OP, of course, unless the writer happens to wear a fez and speak French) Just a thought.

Bound to cause problems, bias and all.

For example, I would describe you as a Loathsome Mechjeb Hater <3 as opposed to an artiste who makes entertaining graphic novels.

edit: this was less awkward when it wasn't at the top of it's own page.

For example, I would describe you as a Loathsome Mechjeb Hater <3 as opposed to an artiste who makes entertaining graphic novels.

Really, I answer to either. <3

(Enders would have to actually update the OP, of course, unless the writer happens to wear a fez and speak French) Just a thought.

Not a bad idea, they would have to be run past Endersmans first, though.

I've said it before, and I'll say it again. I'm going to add descriptions. The only reason I didn't was to get the update posted for you guys. The next update will include dearie toons for the new members. I'll also update some old ones.

- - - Updated - - -

Descriptions* not dearie toons. (For some reason I can't save an edit on my phone)
